check.name: Translation
check.description: Class which represents a resource bundle. <EOF>

property.name: fileExtensions
property.description: Specify file type extension to identify translation files. Setting this property is typically only required if your translation files are preprocessed and the original files do not have the extension {@code .properties}

property.name: baseName
property.description: Specify Base name of resource bundles which contain message resources. It helps the check to distinguish config and localization resources.

property.name: requiredTranslations
property.description: Specify language codes of required translations which must exist in project.
